extendedInfo.description: Trophy checklist for Test Drive Ferrari Racing Legends on the PS3, to keep track of your progress towards Platinum.. All 46 Trophies included. . Descriptions for all 46 Trophies. Your trophy progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your trophy progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Trophy description is shown when a row pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps.
